set.xpath: items/item[starts-with (@name, 'drinkJar') or starts-with (@name, 'drinkCan') and not (contains(@name, 'Magazine')) and not (contains(@name, 'Schematic')) and not (contains(@name, 'Empty'))]/property/property[@name='Delay']/@value

append.xpath: items/item[starts-with (@name, 'drinkJar') or starts-with (@name, 'drinkCan') and not (contains(@name, 'Magazine')) and not (contains(@name, 'Schematic')) and not (contains(@name, 'Empty'))]/property[@class='Action0']

set.xpath: /items/item[starts-with (@name, 'gun') and contains (@name, 'T1') and not (contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not (contains(@name, 'Bot'))]/property[@name='ScrapTimeOverride']/@value
/items/item[starts-with (@name, 'gun') and contains (@name, 'T2') and not (contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not (contains(@name, 'Bot'))]/property[@name='ScrapTimeOverride']/@value
/items/item[starts-with (@name, 'gun') and contains (@name, 'T3') and not (contains(@name, 'Parts')) and not (contains(@name, 'Bot'))]/property[@name='ScrapTimeOverride']/@value
